Leslie Barlow bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí na Minneapolis, Minnesota, lekwasịrị ányá na ihe osise ndị na-atụle isiokwu nke ọdịbendị dị iche iche, njirimara, na ezinụlọ.

A mụrụ Leslie Barlow ma zụlite ya na South Minneapolis ma gaa Southwest High School Ọ natara nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na Studio Arts na obere na Business Administration na Mahadum Wisconsin-Stout na 2011
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ nọ n'ọkwá nke ónyé na-arụ ọrụ na ọnye ọrụ afọ ofufo na ụlọ ọrụ nka oge a nke dị na Minneapolis The Soap Factory
Barlow gara n'ihu nweta nzere Masters of Fine Arts na Minneapolis College of Art and Design na Drawing and Painting na 2016.

Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Minneapolis College of Art and Design, Barlow nwere ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya, nke akpọrọ Loving, ma gosipụta ọrụ ya n'ebe ndị dị ka US Bank Stadium. Barlow na-eji usoro dị iche iche emepụta ihe ya, site na ihe osise naanị ruo ihe mgbasa ozi agwakọta nke na-eji ihe dị iche iche, dị ka otu o si "na-etinye ákwà na ogwe aka na akwa nke na-egosi site na ọnụ ọgụgụ ya..." Ọrụ Barlow na-arụkarị ọrụ n'ime isiokwu agbụrụ, okike, mmekọahụ, na ezinụlọ. Ihe ndị a pụtara ìhè n'ihe ngosi mbụ ya, Loving, nke na-edozi ajụjụ ndị metụtara isiokwu ndị a niile.
A zụlitere Barlow n'ezinụlọ nwere agbụrụ dị iche iche, nke nwéré mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ihe dị n'ọrụ ya. Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na onyinyo na akụkọ gbara njirimara na ọdịbendị dị iche iche gburugburu.

A họọrọ Barlow n'etiti ndị omenkà 34 ndị ọzọ dị n'ógbè ahụ iji mepụta ihe osise sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Minnesota Vikings màkà mmeghe nke US Bank Stadium, ebe Barlow mepụtara nnukwu foto 6 nkè ndị bụbu ndị egwuregwu Vikings.
2019 McKnight Fellow maka ndị na-ese ihe nkiri
